hero.title: The Journey
hero.subtitle: From curiosity to creation
hero.quote: Every great brand starts with a story, and mine began with a simple question: What if?

milestones.title: The Beginning
milestones.story: Where it all began. I discovered my love for coding and technology. The foundation I built here continues to serve me well.

milestones.title: First Steps
milestones.story: My first step into the professional world. This is where I learned the fundamentals and developed my problem-solving skills. Every project was a learning opportunity.

milestones.title: Deep Dive
milestones.story: Diving deeper into the world of machine learning and artificial intelligence. This program challenged me to think critically and push the boundaries of what's possible.

milestones.title: Taking Flight
milestones.story: This is where my journey truly took off. Working on cutting-edge web applications, I discovered my passion for building solutions that make a difference. Each day brings new challenges and opportunities to grow.

milestones.title: Creating Impact
milestones.story: Today, I'm building AvoMeBot - a personal brand that reflects my journey and helps others discover their own path. It's not just about technology; it's about connection, growth, and making a difference.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.content: I believe in continuous growth, authentic connection, and building things that matter. Every challenge is an opportunity, every project a canvas for innovation.
